#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		int l=0;char x;
		x=getchar();
		while((x=getchar())!='\n'){
			switch(x){
				case'a':
				case'e':
				case'i':
				case'o':
				case'u':l=1;break;
				
			}
		}
		if(l==1)
			cout<<"yes"<<endl;
		else
			cout<<"no"<<endl;
	}
}
